scripts.build: sed '/build:/d; /# TODO:/d;' docker-compose.yml > docker-compose.yml.example   &&  tar --exclude-from=.gitignore -czvf  openldap-server.tar.gz docker-compose.yml.example .env.example openldap-ubuntu/Dockerfile openldap-ubuntu/docker-entrypoint.sh openldap-ubuntu/slapd-debconf.sh openldap-ubuntu/autofs-ldap.ldif openldap-ubuntu/custom/init/ openldap-ubuntu/custom/data/ openldap-ubuntu/custom/cert/ openldap-ubuntu/custom/examples/
